surf.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: to ride on waves while standing on a special board
surf.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: the white substance that forms on top of waves as they move towards the shore
surf.translation[2].definitions[0].defin: to look quickly at information on the Internet or at several different television programmes to find something that interests you
surf.translation[2].definitions[0].examp: You can surf 35 home shopping channels and still not find what you want.
